title: New: Mind Not The Timid – The White Oak
content:
Nashville ten piece (yes, you heard that right, TEN) Mind Not The Timid continue their stake to the throne of epic, Arcade Fire brand indie with their newest track The White Oak.

Taken from their forthcoming album Beacons, it’s a wonderfully expansive violin led number, that’s equally as likely to cause a singalong as it is to simply stop people in their tracks in absolute awe. Beacons is rapidly becoming one of my most hotly anticipated releases of the year. Check out The White Oak below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
